name: .MAMC File Extension
summary: Learn about .MAMC files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an MAMC file in Murgee Auto Mouse Click (Windows). To do so, select Load from the program's right-hand side. Then, navigate to and open your MAMC file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

images.alt: Screenshot of a .mamc file in Murgee Auto Mouse Click
images.caption: MAMC file open in Murgee Auto Mouse Click
